title: Women's 500 m - Speed Skating Sapporo 1972 Winter Olympics
table: {"0":{"0":null,"1":"Women's 500 m 1972","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":null,"6":null,"7":null,"8":"4.","9":"5.","10":"6.","11":"7.","12":"8.","13":"9.","14":"10.","15":"11.","16":"12.","17":"13.","18":"14.","19":"15.","20":"16.","21":"17.","22":"18.","23":"19.","24":"20.","25":"21.","26":"22.","27":"23.","28":"24.","29":"25.","30":"26.","31":"27.","32":"28.","33":null,"34":null,"35":null,"36":"Women's 500 m - Speed Skating - Sapporo 1972 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes). Skaters had to change lanes in the back straightaway of each lap in order to skate an equal distance. The skater on the outer lane had the right of way and the skater leaving the inner lane should avoid collision. The Olympic gold medal winner was the athlete with the fastest time for the race. Event facts: Women's 500 m competition was held at the Makomanai Speed Skating Rink and 29 athletes participated in the event.","37":null,"38":"These results for Women's 500 m - Sapporo 1972 Winter Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database","39":null},"1":{"0":null,"1":"Women's 500 m 1972","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":"Anne Henning","6":"Vera Krasnova","7":"Lyudmila Titova","8":"Sheila Young","9":"Monika Pflug","10":"Atje Keulen-Deelstra","11":"Kay Lunda","12":"Alla Butova","13":"Sachiko Saito","14":"Elisabeth van den Brom","15":"Sigrid Sundby","16":"Paula Dufter","17":"Ruth Schleiermacher","18":"Cathy Priestner","19":"Ann-Sofie J\u00e4rnstr\u00f6m","20":"Arja Kantola","21":"Kirsti Biermann","22":"Ylva Hedlund","23":"Lisbeth Berg","24":"Trijnie Rep","25":"Yoshiko Onozawa","26":"Choi Jung-hee","27":"Sylvia Filipsson","28":"Tuula Vilkas","29":"Doreen McCannell","30":"Lee Kyung-hee","31":"Monika St\u00fctzle","32":"Tak In-sook","33":"Sylvia Burka","34":null,"35":null,"36":"Women's 500 m - Speed Skating - Sapporo 1972 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes).
